widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (75,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (18, 12), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 7), size = (690, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 33), size = (690, 38), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description ]), "category": (75,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 7), size = (690, 26), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (15, 33), size = (690, 22), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the description ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 18)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"templates": {"default": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (60, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (150, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 0), size = (400, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1000, 6), size = (140, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (60, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (150, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (260, 0), size = (400, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1000, 6), size = (140, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 40 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (1000, 40), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 40), size = (1000, 80), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_WRAP, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 120 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 5), size = (1000, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 26), size = (1000, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (1020, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (750, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the essid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 35), size = (220, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is the interface MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440, 35), size = (220, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 0 is the encryption MultiContentEntryText(pos = (680, 5), size = (290, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 0 is the signal MultiContentEntryText(pos = (680, 35), size = (290, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 0 is the maxrate MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), png = 6), # index 6 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 4), size = (690, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 0), # index 0 is the hdd_description MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 37), size = (670, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the device info MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 6), size = (55, 55), png = 7), # index 3 is the device pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (68, 41), size = (15, 16), png = 8), # index 4 is the online state pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 62), size = (800, 2), png = 9), # index 3 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 65 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (930, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 33), size = (930, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the state MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 2), # index 2 is the status pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular1", 20),gFont("Regular1", 14)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 0), size = (48, 48), png = 1), # index 1 is the expandable/expanded/verticalline icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 4), size = (420, 26), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the Hostname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (140, 5), size = (320, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (140, 26), size = (320, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 4 is the sharedescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (45, 0), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the nfs/cifs icon MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (90, 0), size = (48, 48), png = 6), # index 6 is the isMounted icon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14),gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5,5),size = (120,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 1),# index 0 is the MenuText, MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (130,5),size = (25,25),png = 2),# index 1 i direction pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160,5),size = (270,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 3),# index 2 is remote name/number MultiContentEntryText(pos = (440,5),size = (60,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT,text = 4),# index 3 is length of call MultiContentEntryText(pos = (510,5),size = (225,24),flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER,text = 5),# index 4 is my number/name for number ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",20)], "itemHeight": 40 }
